title: Identity's Public Survival

panel_structure.description: The Architect gestures to crowd where everyone wears semi-transparent masks, each person's true face flickering beneath their public persona, stage lights creating harsh shadows between authentic and performed selves
Identity appears as chameleon-like entity adapting to each social context, masks pile up like discarded costumes, background shows Darwin's evolution chart but for social personas
